title: PBE
body: I am new at pbe and i don't have any of rp or blue essence could some one tell me what to do?

replies.body: Our PBE folks [posted about this here](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-there-are-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence), but currency has been adjust to provide a stipend daily around noon pacific.
